description:
Complete your child’s first masterpiece together!
The Crayon Classic coloring game, made with parenting experience by a hands-on dad, is finally here!
The original beloved Crayon series, Crayon Classic, is a family-friendly coloring game optimized for Nintendo Switch™'s touch screen.

1. Why Crayon Classic?
Real crayon-like natural colors
We replicated the texture and colors of real crayons exactly. Your child can color naturally as if using real crayons.

The achievement of completing to the end
Our little star and badge systems help your child keep going without giving up until completion. Watching the finished work boosts your child’s confidence.

Precious family time together
Create moments to color and talk together as a whole family. Even grandparents can easily operate it, so three generations can enjoy it together.

2. Special features of Crayon Classic
Colors identical to real crayons
A natural crayon touch familiar to your child’s eyes and hands

Little star system to help color to completion
Encourages the achievement of finishing without giving up

Badge system encouraging creative coloring
A reward system encouraging creative coloring

Character image save feature
You can view your child’s precious artwork anytime

24 characters and 72 images total
No chance to get bored with the variety of characters

3. Perfect for such times!
When you need an activity to do with your child on a rainy day at home

To keep your child entertained on long trips

An activity for three generations to enjoy at grandparents’ house

When you want to hold a coloring contest with friends

4. Use with peace of mind
Safe environment – your child can use it safely

Always available offline – coloring possible without internet

Optimized for Nintendo Switch touch screen – comfortable to use

One purchase for the whole family – use continuously without extra charges

5. An game made with a dad’s sincere parenting experience
Not just a simple coloring game. Made by a dad who has experienced parenting and pondered: “What does my child really need?”

Compliment your child’s drawings and enjoy coloring and talking about the pictures as a whole family.

Catch both your child’s imagination and family memories with Crayon Classic!
Watch the precious family time created while coloring and the moments when your child’s creativity blooms.
